Html: For both bear or cat profiles, I am not given the option to select the 245 lvl T9 gear, only heroic versions show.  I can only get them to show if I got into Filters and check the box "ALL (Overides all but Options & l-Filter)" .  Only then can I select them as gear choices. I double checked and all the filters are set properly to their defaut settings.
Just use ALL until we can get the filtering issues worked out. It's a combination of bad data and bad filters.
